ValidationRule.description: When Specialist Name is changed, it is mandate to change Status to "Reassigned".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), RecordTypeId = '012A0000000ViNJ', ISCHANGED( Specialist_Name__c ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Reassigned') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please change the Status to "Reassigned" upon Specialist changed.
